Package PD

Class Die

java.lang.Object
PD.Die
public class Die extends Object
Die is a Class that represents a Die that has a particular number of faces.
Author:
(David Santos)

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Die()
    Instantiates a Die that has 6 faces.

    Instantiates a Die with the specified number of Faces.

    • Die

      public Die(int numFaces) throws NumberOfFacesRangeException
      Instantiates a Die with the specified number of Faces.
      Parameters:
      numFaces - for the number of faces.
      Throws:
      NumberOfFacesRangeException - - if the number of Faces is not greater than 0.

    • roll

      public int roll()
      Rolls the die and returns a random value based on the number of faces.
      Returns:
      int face of dice that is up (random number between 1 and number of faces).
